page.title: 15CHRISTCHURCH SURVEY
page.content: A few days ago we went into Christchurch and interviewed some people this is what we found out. Most people of all ages liked Christchurch.They liked it because it was small and easy to get around. Everyone liked the new improvements and found them a great help to shopping. Some people ,especially the people who were over 60,thought that the younger generation were more violent than their generation because there is less order in homes.The price of food has gone up a lot in the last 10/15 years and there is a lot more tinned food. Transport has changed quite a bit and there is now a lot more private transport than 10 years ago.Most older people's favourite pastime is reading and the middle aged people liked sport.People under 20 liked to do more adventurous things.
